job_tasks.justification: Image recognition is a task that falls under the broader umbrella of machine learning modeling, often involving deep learning techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: gebruikt structured output om dynamische API-calls mogelijk te maken
job_tasks.justification: Using structured output for API calls, especially in the context of LLMs, is a modeling technique to control and format model outputs for integration.

job_tasks.phrase: agentic system
job_tasks.justification: Building agentic systems involves developing software that can act autonomously and interact with environments, requiring significant software development skills.

job_tasks.justification: Aiming to be an AI-first organization implies integrating AI deeply into all business operations and software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van een voice-API
job_tasks.justification: Developing an API is a core software development task, focusing on building interfaces for applications.

job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the need for software development to create intelligent agent systems.

job_tasks.phrase: bots die bots valideren
job_tasks.justification: Developing systems where bots validate other bots requires robust software engineering and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: gebruikt structured output om dynamische API-calls mogelijk te maken

job_tasks.justification: Integrating new AI techniques into existing customer service systems is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-first development-workflow
job_tasks.justification: Adopting an AI-first development workflow indicates a focus on building software with AI as a primary component.

job_tasks.phrase: vertaalt businessvragen naar haalbare technische oplossingen

soft_skills.phrase: Jij bent degene die de dag na een nieuwe productlancering al een prototype klaar heeft staan
neemt de verantwoordelijkheid voor het hele scrumproces
Je vertaalt businessvragen naar haalbare technische oplossingen
Je krijgt de vrijheid om zelf tools en methoden te kiezen om de doelstellingen te halen.
Jij bent degene die de dag na een nieuwe productlancering al een prototype klaar heeft staan van bijvoorbeeld die nieuwe voice-API die gisteren gelanceerd werd.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and fine-tuning generative AI applications, utilizing frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, and working with models from OpenAI. It explicitly mentions core GenAI tasks such as developing agentic systems, fine-tuning language models, and integrating them into production-ready solutions.
